inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getResource.

path.description: Full path of the resource.  If no path is found, an error will be returned.

restApiId.description: REST API id that owns the resource. If no REST API is found, an error will be returned.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getResource.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

parentId.description: Set to the ID of the parent Resource.

pathPart.description: Set to the path relative to the parent Resource.
